channel.title: Initiatives on Water Data Collaborative
channel.description: Recent content in Initiatives on Water Data Collaborative

item.description: The Water Boards’ Office of Information Management and Analysis (OIMA) hosted a Data Innovation Challenge this spring. The event culminated on April 22, with presentation and judging of the entries. The focus was on creating apps, visualizations, and other tools that can help better harness data that is currently available. Generally, state government projects and products fail to share; disseminate; or make use, to its potential, the large amount of data that the government itself maintains.
✔️4 months ✔️25+ machine-readable datasets ✔️15 events ✔️$12,000 in “big checks” ✔️20+ open data projects Additional resources: #CAWaterDataChallenge on Twitter
